چین نے 1980 کی دہائی میں اولمپک کھیلوں م: When did China start excelling in the Olympics? China Olympic performance 1980s

The People's Republic of China sent its first full athletic delegation to the Summer Olympic Games in the 1984 Summer Olympics which was held in Los Angeles, United States. As of 2024, China has finished at 1st place in the Summer Olympics once, at 2nd place four times, and 3rd place twice.
When did China start excelling in the Olympics? China Olympic performance 1980s

China won 15 gold medals in shooting, gymnastics, diving, swimming, weightlifting, volleyball and fencing. The team finished fourth in the medal tally. Xu Haifeng, a pistol shooter won the first Olympic gold medal, making him the first Chinese to be crowned an Olympic Champion.
